assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The SVA-F variant in SMN1 intron 7 described in this manuscript has been submitted to ClinVar (ClinVar accession SUB11311494; ExternalRef removed) and GenBank (GenBank accession ON513449; ExternalRef removed); The data that supports the findings of this study are available in the manuscript and in online resource. Exome sequencing data are not publicly available due to privacy or ethical restrictions.
